- [DELETE MY ACCOUNT TERMS](https://policy.aykacare.in/delete-my-account-terms/): AYKA Care Application Users have the option to request permanent deletion of their account at any time. To initiate this process, the user must submit an account deletion request through the designated support channel within the application or via our customer support email. Before processing the request, our support team will seek written confirmation from the user that: Upon receiving this confirmation, our team will verify the request and approve the deletion. The deletion process will be irreversible, and the user will no longer be able to access the account or any associated data. AYKA Expert Application and Clinic Dashboard [&hellip;]

To ensure a high standard of ethics and conduct, AYKA enforces a Zero Tolerance Policy for any form of misconduct, abuse, or unethical behavior. Violation of this policy may result in immediate suspension or permanent termination of access to AYKA’s platform and services. This entire policy abide under the rules of AYKA Terms and Conditions.
